concepts.name: Cinematography
concepts.description: The art and technique of capturing images through motion pictures.

concepts.name: Filmmaking
concepts.description: The process of making a film.

concepts.name: Visual Storytelling
concepts.description: The art of conveying a story through visual elements.

concepts.name: Composition
concepts.description: The placement and arrangement of visual elements within a frame.

concepts.name: Framing
concepts.description: The process of determining what will be within the camera's frame.

concepts.name: Depth of Field
concepts.description: The area in focus in front of and behind the subject.

concepts.name: Color Grading
concepts.description: The process of altering the color and tone of an image in post-production.

concepts.name: Coverage
concepts.description: The process of capturing multiple angles and shots of a scene.
